column2: "Only ARKS members of a certain caliber receive clearance for the Floating Continent. It's filled with formidable hostiles, as you've learned the hard way."
"This may be a tough one, even for you, so don't push it. Of course, if you blow this one, I'll have to start calling you Newbie again."
"Oh, it's a little pathetic to relapse in just one go... right? Whatever it is, just give it your all!"
